thread.title: 43-Year-Old Sister To Bayelsa Governor, Tari, Engaged To Her 29-Year-Old Lover
thread.title_full: 43-Year-Old Sister To Bayelsa Governor, Tari, Engaged To Her 29-Year-Old Lover

author: Jo Daniel
title: 43-Year-Old Sister To Bayelsa Governor, Tari, Engaged To Her 29-Year-Old Lover
text:
Jo Daniel February 1, 2017 
43 year old Younger sister to wife of Bayelsa state Governor Tari Konyefa and her 29year old lover Miebi Albert is now engaged, ebiwalismoment.com gathered that the couple who started dating late March 2016 got engaged on her 43rd birthday at a Popular Hotel in Bayelsa on December 12th.. 
The duo always flaunt their undying romantic affair on Social media, they are proud of each other… 
Going through their photos you’ll always see their exotic comments, and love professes.. 
ebiwalismoment.com also gathered that last week Madam Tari as she’s fondly called who is a divorcee got her lil boo a new car, and they’re currently the talk of the town in the state, he has access to all her cars, and Ranges.. 
She also have a 16year old daughter with ex hubby 
According to him there’s no age in love, and he fond love when he met her.. 
Congrats to them..
